channel.title: CVE Feed for Baxter -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Baxter -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-26392|2024-09-17T02:31:43.990Z -- baxter -- baxter%20spectrum%20wireless%20battery%20module%20%28wbm%29
item.description: The Baxter Spectrum WBM (v16, v16D38) and Baxter Spectrum WBM (v17, v17D19, v20D29 to v20D32) when in superuser mode is susceptible to format string attacks via application messaging. An attacker could use this to read memory in the WBM to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2022-26390|2024-09-17T04:09:45.443Z -- baxter -- baxter%20spectrum%20wireless%20battery%20module%20%28wbm%29
item.description: The Baxter Spectrum Wireless Battery Module (WBM) stores network credentials and PHI (only applicable to Spectrum IQ pumps using auto programming) in unencrypted form. An attacker with physical access to a device that hasn't had all data and settings erased may be able to extract sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-6795|2024-09-09T20:08:01.134Z -- baxter -- connex%20health%20portal
item.description:
In Connex health portal released before8/30/2024, SQL injection vulnerabilities were found that could have allowed an unauthenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to Connex portal's database.
An attacker could have submitted a crafted payload to Connex portal that could have resulted in modification and disclosure of database content
and/or perform administrative operations including shutting down the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-6796|2024-09-09T20:08:22.237Z -- baxter -- connex%20health%20portal
item.description: In Baxter Connex health portal released before 8/30/2024, an improper access control vulnerability has been found that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to Connex portal's database and/or modify content.

item.title: CVE-2024-5176|2024-09-03T15:31:58.511Z -- baxter -- welch%20allyn%20configuration%20tool
item.description: Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability in Baxter Welch Allyn Configuration Tool may allow Remote Services with Stolen Credentials.This issue affects Welch Allyn Configuration Tool: versions 1.9.4.1 and prior.

item.title: CVE-2024-1275|2024-08-01T18:33:25.355Z -- baxter -- welch%20allyn%20connex%20spot%20monitor
item.description: Use of Default Cryptographic Key vulnerability in Baxter Welch Allyn Connex Spot Monitor may allow Configuration/Environment Manipulation.This issue affects Welch Allyn Connex Spot Monitor in all versions prior to 1.52.

item.title: CVE-2024-1275|2024-06-05T15:01:00.230Z -- baxter -- welch%20allyn%20connex%20spot%20monitor
item.description: Use of Default Cryptographic Key vulnerability in Baxter Welch Allyn Connex Spot Monitor may allow Configuration/Environment Manipulation.This issue affects Welch Allyn Connex Spot Monitor in all versions prior to 1.52.

item.title: CVE-2024-5176|2024-06-05T14:41:49.489Z -- baxter -- welch%20allyn%20configuration%20tool
item.description: Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability in Baxter Welch Allyn Configuration Tool may allow Remote Services with Stolen Credentials.This issue affects Welch Allyn Configuration Tool: versions 1.9.4.1 and prior.

item.title: CVE-2024-5176|2024-08-01T21:03:11.030Z -- baxter -- welch%20allyn%20configuration%20tool
item.description: Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability in Baxter Welch Allyn Configuration Tool may allow Remote Services with Stolen Credentials.This issue affects Welch Allyn Configuration Tool: versions 1.9.4.1 and prior.

item.title: CVE-2024-6796|2024-09-09T19:28:30.647Z -- baxter -- connex%20health%20portal
item.description: In Baxter Connex health portal released before 8/30/2024, an improper access control vulnerability has been found that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to Connex portal's database and/or modify content.

item.title: CVE-2024-6795|2024-09-09T19:24:01.776Z -- baxter -- connex%20health%20portal
item.description:
In Connex health portal released before8/30/2024, SQL injection vulnerabilities were found that could have allowed an unauthenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to Connex portal's database.
An attacker could have submitted a crafted payload to Connex portal that could have resulted in modification and disclosure of database content
and/or perform administrative operations including shutting down the database.
